welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sheldon, a charming city known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to explore and immerse yourselves in all that this beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport offers a wide range of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is the newest addition to Birmingham Airport and mainly serves low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport with no time or data restrictions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all cargo shipments and offers efficient and secure handling.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
